DOC.brief_summary: In study tooth need extract replace implant ( artificial root ) place appointment extraction . The investigator want observe gum change shape heal two different scenario : 1 . If soft tissue around tooth thin , follow extraction implant placement extra soft tissue graft ( take palate ) area order increase thickness gum heal . 2 . If soft tissue around tooth thick , implant place without soft tissue graft . Previous study show method work give good result . In fact two method use routinely never compare objectively one another research study . The main purpose study evaluate difference term esthetic outcomes two treatment modality crown place implant .
DOC.brief_title: Case Selection Treatment Protocol Immediate Dental Implants Esthetic Zone
DOC.criteria: 1 . The patient 18 year old . 2 . Ability understand provide inform consent start study . 3 . Ability willingness comply study requirement . 4 . The patient , childbearing potential , negative urine pregnancy test . 5 . Adequate oral hygiene allow implant therapy consistent standard care . 6 . Adequate bone volume accommodate plan endosseous dental implant placement accord immediate placement protocol utilize Straumann Bone Level implant RC 4.1mm Bone Level Implant NC 3.3 mm 8 , 10,12 14mm length . 7 . One tooth anterior maxilla ( first premolar first premolar ) require extraction result single tooth gap plan restore dental implant determine patient 's dental provider . 8 . The site treat surround two natural teeth . 9 . Except site treat , none maxillary incisor , canine first premolars display marginal soft tissue recession . 10 . Following extraction , intact extraction socket bony wall present . 11 . Primary stability implant consistent standard care achieve time implant placement . 12 . Patient must able pay fee relate surgical implant placement relate extraction , graft implant site , half cost crown time implant placement . 1 . Patient report tobacco use within last five year . Tobacco use study define current smoking habit moderate heavy smoking ( 10 cigarette per day ) tobacco chew use . 2 . History alcoholism drug abuse within past 5 year . 3 . Severe wear etiology bruxism clench habit . 4 . Patient significant untreated periodontal disease ( grade III IV ) , caries , clinical radiographic sign infection within two adjacent tooth position implant area . 5 . History HIV infection , Hepatitis B C. 6 . Patients history systemic disease precludes standard dental implant therapy alters daily activity level consistent ASA III classification ( include cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , metabolic , neurologic , pulmonary , endocrine , autoimmune , psychiatric disorder ) . 7 . Presence local inflammation mucosal diseases lichen planus . 8 . Patient history consistent high risk subacute bacterial endocarditis . 9 . Current hematological disorder warfarin ( similar ) therapy . 10 . Patient disease affect bone metabolism , , limit , osteoporosis , hyperthyroidism , hyperparathyroidism , congenital connective tissue disorder ( e.g. , osteogenesis imperfecta ) , Paget 's disease . 11 . Patient take medication treatment know effect bone turnover , include : thiazide diuretic , calcitonin , systemic steroid , bisphosphonates , vitamin D ( > 800 IU/day ) , estrogen progesterone therapy . 12 . Current steroid treatment : define person within last two year receive two week dose equivalent 20 mg hydrocortisone . 13 . Patient currently undergo chemotherapy . 14 . Patient history radiation treatment head neck . 15 . Physical mental handicap would interfere patient 's ability exercise good oral hygiene regular basis . 16 . Use investigational drug device within 30 day period immediately prior implant surgery . 17 . Patient pregnant . 18 . Extraction sit anatomic condition preclude immediate implant placement .
